<?php
require_once('/wordpress/wp-load.php');

// Create plugin directory
$plugin_dir = WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/hidden-gems';
if (!file_exists($plugin_dir)) {
    mkdir($plugin_dir, 0755, true);
}

// Download main plugin file
$plugin_content = file_get_contents('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WeAreIconick/hidden-gems/main/hidden-gems.php');
if ($plugin_content !== false) {
    file_put_contents($plugin_dir . '/hidden-gems.php', $plugin_content);
    error_log('Downloaded main plugin file');
} else {
    error_log('Failed to download main plugin file');
}

// Download readme file
$readme_content = file_get_contents('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WeAreIconick/hidden-gems/main/readme.txt');
if ($readme_content !== false) {
    file_put_contents($plugin_dir . '/readme.txt', $readme_content);
    error_log('Downloaded readme file');
}

// Download uninstall file
$uninstall_content = file_get_contents('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/WeAreIconick/hidden-gems/main/uninstall.php');
if ($uninstall_content !== false) {
    file_put_contents($plugin_dir . '/uninstall.php', $uninstall_content);
    error_log('Downloaded uninstall file');
}

// Activate plugin
$plugin_file = 'hidden-gems/hidden-gems.php';
if (file_exists(WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/' . $plugin_file)) {
    activate_plugin($plugin_file);
    error_log('Hidden Gems: Plugin activated successfully');
} else {
    error_log('Hidden Gems: Plugin file not found at ' . WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/' . $plugin_file);
}
?>
